title: Thunder pour it on again, laud balanced attack
content: The Thunder have outscored the Grizzlies by a combined 70 points, the second-highest point differential through two games of a series in playoff history.

title: Haliburton blunt about bad blood in Bucks-Pacers
content: "We don't like them, they don't like us and that's just what it is," Pacers guard Tyrese Haliburton said after Indiana took a 2-0 lead in the series with Milwaukee.

title: 'Incredible' Tkachuk returns, nets 2 for Panthers
content: Florida forward Matthew Tkachuk made his long-awaited return to the lineup, scoring twice in the second period, as the Panthers handled the rival Tampa Bay Lightning, 6-2, in their Eastern Conference first-round series opener at Amalie Arena on Tuesday.

title: Celtics' Pritchard honored with Sixth Man award
content: Payton Pritchard, who went from the fringes of the Boston rotation to a constant source of energy and production off the bench, was named the NBA's Sixth Man of the Year.

title: Jones: Cowboys working on 'substantive trades'
content: Owner and general manager Jerry Jones said Tuesday the Cowboys are working on "pretty substantive trades" ahead of the NFL draft.

title: Mike Patrick, longtime ESPN broadcaster, dies
content: Mike Patrick, who spent 36 years as a play-by-play commentator for ESPN and was the network's first NFL voice for "Sunday Night Football," has died at age 80.

title: Ex-NFL kicker Feely to run for Congress in Ariz.
content: Former NFL kicker Jay Feely is leaving the broadcast booth after a decade and entering the political arena, telling ESPN's Josh Weinfuss on Tuesday that he will run for the U.S. House of Representatives in Arizona's 5th Congressional District.

title: Colón fired as CEO of U.S. Center for SafeSport
content: The U.S. Center for SafeSport fired CEO Ju'Riese Colón on Tuesday in the latest and most visceral sign of a crisis that began after revelations the center had hired an investigator who would later be charged with rape.

title: Our annual NFL Nation mock draft: All 32 team reporters make their picks for Round 1
content: The Titans filled their biggest need at quarterback with the No. 1 pick, but which team was next to take a QB?

title: One ring away: The players who could cement their legacies with a title this season
content: Great regular seasons don't cement NBA legacies. Great playoff runs do. These six stars -- featuring one MVP and a likely one -- need deep playoff runs to secure their places in the game.

title: NBA Rank, playoffs edition: The 50 most impactful players for 2025
content: From MVP hopefuls to postseason heroes, we're counting down the top 50 players who will decide the 2025 playoffs.

title: 'Completely separate and at odds': The divisions and chaos that led to the end of the Luka Doncic era in Dallas
content: Doncic's time in Dallas ended with a shocking trade on Feb. 2, but the beginning of the end dates to the summer of 2023.

title: 'Once-in-a-lifetime experience:' How the NFL's smallest market is coming up big to host the draft
content: The Lambeau countdown clock to the draft is running out of days, and the NFL's smallest town is ready.

title: Man City's Champions League push shows fight, even if spark is missing
content: Even if it has not been Manchester City's best season, their last-minute win against Aston Villa can provide an extra boost to qualify for the Champions League.

title: Pep: City's season 'bad' even if we qualify for UCL
content: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola scoffed at suggestions that his team could look back on this season as a special one if they clinch a Champions League berth.

title: Poch will only select 'right characters' for USMNT
content: USMNT head coach Mauricio Pochettino emphasized the importance of selecting players with a strong mentality heading into the Gold Cup this summer.

title: Flick fine with tight Barça win on 40-shot night
content: Barcelona coach Hansi Flick said he wasn't worried his team could only muster one goal in Tuesday's 1-0 win over Mallorca despite racking up 40 shots.

title: UEFA give Man City $6m for most int'l call-ups
content: Manchester City were allocated around €5.17 million ($5.94m), the most of any UEFA club, as part of the European football governing body's Club Benefits Programme to encourage national team participation by players.

title: Bay FC eyes record NWSL crowd at Giants ballpark
content: Bay FC will play the Washington Spirit in a National Women's Soccer League match at Oracle Park, home of baseball's San Francisco Giants.

title: Serie A postpones games due to Pope's funeral
content: Italian top flight Serie A has postponed Saturday's three fixtures until Sunday due to Pope Francis' funeral being held that day in Rome, the league said on Tuesday.

title: Ex-KC GK Schult: Euro teams don't want moms
content: As an Olympic gold medalist and Champions League winner, Almuth Schult was one of the top goalkeepers in women's soccer. She believes her career ended early because European clubs were reluctant to sign a player with children.

title: TST: Solo, Agüero learn matchups for $1M tourney
content: The seven-on-seven soccer teams led by Carli Lloyd, Hope Solo, Ali Krieger, Luis Nani, Miguel Layún, Sergio Agüero and other stars learned their fate for The Soccer Tournament from June 4-9 in Cary, North Carolina.

title: Our Draft Day Predictor settles 10 debates: What the numbers say about QB picks, Round 1 surprises
content: Which QBs will still be available on Day 2? Could Ashton Jeanty slide to the Bears? And where might the top pass catchers land?

title: SGA or Jokic? Castle or Risacher? Our experts pick every NBA award
content: Finalists have been unveiled for seven major individual awards, including MVP. Which superstars did our experts' pick?

title: 'Hello, old friend': Randy Orton delivers surprise RKO on John Cena at Raw
content: A day after winning his record 17th WWE title, John Cena ran into a familiar foe on Monday Night Raw.

title: Bullpen stock watch: Devin Williams deserves a little faith
content: Everything fantasy baseball managers need to know about which closers should be added, dropped, and more.

title: South Carolina up, UCLA down: How the transfer portal impacts the women's Way-Too-Early Top 25﻿
content: Big transfers have put South Carolina at No. 1 and propelled the likes of LSU, Oklahoma and Tennessee higher.

title: Rankings, projections, strategy and cheat sheets
content: Rankings, projections, player profiles, draft strategies -- we've got everything you need to dominate your fantasy women's basketball draft from every angle.

title: Sleepers, breakouts and busts for 2025 WNBA season
content: Which players will exceed fantasy expectations? Who will disappoint? And who is ready to reach an elite level?

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United eye River Plate star Mastantuono
content: Manchester United are considering a move for emerging River Plate star Franco Mastantuono. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: Chris Eubank Jr. vs Conor Benn: How to watch, ring walk time, undercard
content: Chris Eubank Jr. and Conor Benn will face each other in London on Saturday. Here is everything you need to know ahead of the highly anticipated bout.

title: 'I found your dad': The mystery of a missing climber
content: Bill Stampfl vanished climbing Peru's highest mountain 22 years ago. This is the story of the hiker who found him and brought closure to Stampfl's family.

title: Inside the Pahalgam plot: Terrorists used code names Moosa, Yunus and Asif
content: Security agencies have identified the three terrorists behind the deadly Pahalgam attack as Asif Fauji, Suleman Shah, and Abu Talha, believed to be TRF operatives using code names Moosa, Yunus, and Asif. Sketches of the suspects, based on survivor accounts, have been released as a search operation intensifies. According to officials, the trio was previously active in Poonch and had a history of orchestrating terror strikes in the region.

title: Families of victims of terror attack break down, plead in front of Amit Shah - Video
content: Following the Pahalgam terror attack that killed at least 28, Union Home Minister Amit Shah met with victims' families in Srinagar, assuring them justice. Security forces will leave no stone unturned to find the perpetrators. Prime Minister Modi, cutting short his Saudi Arabia visit, convened an urgent briefing.

title: Gold at record high! Sovereign gold bond investors eye 221% returns
content: With gold prices soaring to a record ₹1 lakh per 10 grams, Sovereign Gold Bond (SGB) investors are contemplating selling. Those who invested in 2017 are seeing returns of 221%. Financial experts advise maintaining 10-15% of portfolios in gold for stability.

title: Microsoft’s chief HR to managers: This isn't just about Microsoft's success...
content: Microsoft is implementing stricter performance management policies, including a two-year rehire ban for underperformers and restrictions on internal transfers. These changes aim to accelerate high performance and swiftly address low performance, aligning with industry trends toward performance-based evaluations. The company is also introducing AI-supported tools to aid managers in performance conversations.

title: Bitcoin beats Amazon in market value; becomes world’s 6th most valuable asset
content: Bitcoin's market capitalisation has surged past Amazon, reaching $1.857 trillion and becoming the sixth-largest asset globally. This rally, fueled by increased institutional investment and spot ETF inflows, has propelled Bitcoin to $93,546.

title: Tariffs 'hurt multilateral trade and world economic order,' says China
content: President Xi Jinping has criticized tariffs. He said that tariffs undermine the global economic order. This statement comes amid tensions between China and the United States. Earlier, Donald Trump imposed tariffs on Chinese imports. China retaliated with duties on American goods. China opposes deals at its expense. Foreign Minister Wang Yi urged the UK and EU to defend multilateral trade.

title: Mohammed Siraj wants terrorists to be punished without mercy
content: Indian pacer Mohammed Siraj has condemned the recent terrorist attack in Pahalgam, Jammu and Kashmir, which resulted in the tragic loss of at least 28 lives. In an emotional message on Instagram, Siraj expressed his outrage at the senseless violence against innocent civilians, emphasizing that no ideology can justify such brutality.

title: Tesla Bull 'impressed' as Elon Musk makes promise to investors: Now that the ...
content: Elon Musk announced he will significantly reduce his time commitment to the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) starting next month, a move praised by Tesla investor Dan Ives. This decision comes amid investor concerns about Musk's involvement with the government impacting Tesla's performance, as shares have dropped considerably this year.

title: Nation mourns as J&K victims' stories emerge from different parts - Full List
content: In a devastating terror attack in Jammu & Kashmir, 28 tourists were killed and dozens injured in Pahalgam. The Resistance Front, a Pakistan-backed LeT proxy, claimed responsibility. Gunmen, disguised as Indian Army soldiers, selectively targeted victims, coinciding with high-profile diplomatic visits and escalating tensions between India and Pakistan. The victims included an Indian Navy officer, an IB officer, and tourists from various states.

title: 'Trust Thala': CSK CEO's reassuring message to anxious supporters
content: Chennai Super Kings, a five-time IPL champion, is currently struggling in IPL 2025, sitting at the bottom of the table with only two wins. Following a defeat by Mumbai Indians, CSK CEO Kasi Viswanathan acknowledged the team's poor performance but expressed hope for a turnaround.

title: 'Who should we send Vance to…': Tiffany Fong who refused to be Elon’s baby mama
content: Cryptocurrency influencer Tiffany Fong, known for Elon Musk's unusual proposition, ignited a social media buzz by asking who JD Vance should meet next, following his Vatican visit. The post drew diverse suggestions, ranging from political figures like Putin and Zelensky to celebrities like Drake and Kanye.

title: 'Stupid idea’: Zepto CEO Aadit Pichlai regrets comment on ‘work-life balance’
content: Zepto's CEO, Aadit Palicha, addressed his controversial work-life balance comment, describing it as a 'stupid idea' on a recent podcast. He emphasized Zepto's intense, results-oriented culture, acknowledging it's not for everyone but ideal for ambitious individuals. Palicha also reflected on the company's near-death experience during the funding crisis and urged Indian startups to pursue larger ambitions.

title: T.N. govt. approves Chennai Metro Rail’s Airport-Kilambakkam project, forwards proposal to Centre
content: The project would significantly improve the commute for those residing in the city’s southern areas, such as Chromepet, Pallavaram, Tambaram, and Perungalathur

title: U.S. Vice President JD Vance reaches Agra, CM Yogi extends warm welcome
content: In Agra roads were lined with the national flags of India and the United States, along with colorful rangolis, intricate sand art, and eye-catching decorations.

title: Court dismisses claim on Hyderabad’s Bathukamma Kunta, rules in favour of HYDRAA certifying it as lake
content: A civil suit filed by one Yedla Sudhakar Reddy claiming that the land was his, and not a lake has been dismissed by the court, a press release from HYDRAA said

title: Pahalgam terror attack | Two Kashmiri men who went to Pakistan in 2018 suspected to be among the terrorists who killed tourists
content: Based on eyewitness accounts, the Jammu and Kashmir Police released the sketches of three Pakistanis who carried out the attack.

title: Pahalgam terror attack: Two from Andhra Pradesh shot dead by militants
content: Retired SBI employee Chandramouli and senior architect Somisetti Madhusudhan Rao are among the 26 civilians shot dead by militants in J&K’s Pahalgam

title: Madras High Court reverses discharge of T.N. Minister Duraimurugan from 2002 disproportionate assets case
content: Justice P. Velmurugan allows a criminal revision filed by DVAC in 2013 against the 2007 discharge order passed by a special court in Vellore

title: Deputy explosive commissioner’s office in Kendriya Bhavan in Kerala’s Kakkanad receives email bomb threat
content: The mail warned of placing explosive devices in the Petroleum and Explosives Safety Organisation (PESO) in Ernakulam

title: T.N. Raj Bhavan slams media reports portraying V-C conclave as power struggle with government
content: It is unfortunate that some ill-informed media reports have given this well-intentioned academic exercise a political twist, wrongly linking it with the recent Supreme Court judgment, the Raj Bhavan said in a statement

title: Protesting Bengal teachers allow gheraoed SSC chairman to leave office after 40 hours
content: One of the protesters belonging to the Deserving Teachers Forum said SSC chairman was allowed to leave both because he had to be physically present at the court and also to give him some reprieve from confinement on health grounds.

title: The Resistance Front: The banned organisation behind Pahalgam terror attack
content: The Resistance Front or TRF was founded in October 2019, months after Centre bifurcated Jammu and Kashmir, and abrogated Article 370

title: Withdraw G.O. to recruit Group D staff on contract basis: Anbumani Ramadoss
content: In a statement, he said this should not have been done when there is a growing demand to convert contract jobs into permanent ones

title: Former India cricketer asks Rishabh Pant to stop making excuses
content: Delhi Capitals defeated Lucknow Super Giants by eight wickets, leading to visible frustration for LSG captain Rishabh Pant, who was seen in intense discussions with mentor Zaheer Khan after a duck. Ambati Rayudu suggested Pant needs to take more ownership and bat higher in the order. Pant acknowledged LSG's struggle to find their best combination after the loss.

title: India’s composite PMI hits 8-month high in April
content: India's private sector experienced robust expansion in April, reaching an eight-month high driven by strong demand and a surge in foreign orders, particularly for manufactured goods. The Composite PMI climbed to 60.0, signaling the strongest growth since August, with manufacturing hitting a one-year high. New export orders soared, boosting output and employment across both manufacturing and service sectors.

title: Pahalgam attack: What we know about TRF & plotter Saifullah Khalid
content: The Resistance Front (TRF), a Pakistan-backed terror group, claimed responsibility for a deadly attack in Jammu and Kashmir's Pahalgam, killing 28. This incident, occurring before the Amarnath Yatra, highlights TRF's opposition to Kashmir's integration with India and its threats against non-local settlers. The outfit, a proxy of Lashkar-e-Taiba, aims to disrupt regional stability through violence and recruitment.

title: Ex-cricketer says India should never play cricket with Pakistan
content: Following the Pahalgam terror attack that killed at least 26 people, former Bengal cricketer expressed strong sentiments against playing cricket with Pakistan. He emphasized that murdering innocent Indians seemed to be their national sport and urged a response beyond sports.

title: Aryaman Varma: 18-year-old England prodigy's dream wicket is Virat Kohli
content: Aryaman Varma, an 18-year-old leg-spinner, has been awarded the prestigious Wisden Schools Cricketer of the Year award. The Eton College captain's outstanding performance in the 2024 season, where he took a record-breaking 51 wickets, earned him the title. Varma, who was nominated for the award last year as well, expressed his delight at joining the ranks of cricketing legends like Jos Butler and Jonny Bairstow, who are also past winners.

title: J&K attack: Visa issue in planned Euro trip led navy officer to Pahalgam
content: Lieutenant Vinay Narwal, a 26-year-old newlywed from Haryana, was tragically killed in a terrorist attack in Pahalgam, Jammu and Kashmir, while on his honeymoon. He had married Himanshi Narwal just eight days prior, and they had rerouted their honeymoon to J&K after visa issues prevented a trip to Europe.

title: 2 terrorists killed, infiltration bid foiled in J&K's Baramulla
content: The Indian Army successfully thwarted an infiltration attempt along the Line of Control in Baramulla district, eliminating two terrorists amidst an ongoing operation near Uri. This incident occurred a day after a deadly terrorist attack in Pahalgam, which resulted in the deaths of 28 tourists. Security forces recovered a large cache of weapons and ammunition during the operation.

title: Terrorist who shot Karnataka man told his wife: 'Won't kill you, go tell Modi'
content: In a shocking incident, 28 tourists were killed in a terrorist attack near Pahalgam, J&K, marking the deadliest such event since 2019. The Resistance Front, linked to LeT, claimed responsibility. The attack, coinciding with significant international visits and heightened tensions with Pakistan, evoked memories of past massacres.

title: 'Might lose job but ...': Biker releases video after clash with IAF officer in B'luru
content: In Bengaluru, a road rage incident has intensified as BPO employee Vikas Kumar, previously arrested, accuses IAF Wing Commander Shiladitya Bose of assault and false accusations. Vikas claims Bose initiated the altercation after a minor vehicle incident, leading to physical violence and fabricated charges. The situation has escalated with a counter-FIR, protests, and government intervention, highlighting linguistic tensions and demands for justice.

title: Sensex surges over 500 points, crosses 80,000 level; Nifty50 above 24,300
content: Stock market today: BSE Sensex and Nifty50, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in green on Wednesday. While BSE Sensex went above 80,200, Nifty50 was above 24,350.

title: Watch: Ubaid Shah’s wild wicket celebration turns into an accident in PSL
content: During a thrilling PSL 2025 match between Multan Sultans and Lahore Qalandars, Multan pacer Ubaid Shah's exuberant celebration after taking a wicket turned comical. He accidentally smacked his teammate, wicketkeeper Usman Khan, on the head. The incident, caught on camera, quickly went viral, turning Shah into the PSL's latest meme sensation.

title: Pahalgam terrorist attack: Search operation under way, J&K on high alert
content: A terror attack in Jammu and Kashmir's Pahalgam has claimed at least 28 lives, prompting swift action from the Indian government. PM Modi convened a high-level meeting, while Finance Minister Sitharaman cut short her US trip. Political leaders, including Rahul Gandhi, have engaged with officials and expressed solidarity.

title: J&K attack: On holiday, IB officer posted in Hyd shot in front of wife, kids
content: In a tragic incident, an Intelligence Bureau officer from Hyderabad was among the 28 tourists killed in a terrorist attack near Pahalgam, Kashmir. The Resistance Front, a proxy of Lashkar-e-Taiba, claimed responsibility for the assault, which occurred during high-profile diplomatic visits. The attack, the deadliest since 2019, is seen as an attempt to internationalize the Kashmir dispute.

title: IPL match today, SRH vs MI: Team prediction, pitch report, weather update
content: Sunrisers Hyderabad, led by Pat Cummins, faces Mumbai Indians, captained by Hardik Pandya, in a crucial IPL match. SRH struggles with inconsistency in batting and bowling, needing a turnaround after only two wins. MI, boosted by three consecutive victories, including a dominant win against CSK, aims to continue their momentum on Hyderabad's high-scoring pitch.

title: BLUNDER! Did Ramiz Raja accidentally endorse IPL during PSL?
content: During a post-match presentation at the PSL, commentator Ramiz Raja mistakenly referred to the tournament as the "HBL IPL," a slip-up that quickly went viral.

title: 'Victims deserve justice': Rahul Gandhi speaks with Shah, J&K CM after Pahalgam attack
content: Following the terror attack in Pahalgam, which resulted in the deaths of at least 28 tourists, the Leader of Opposition spoke with Home Minister Amit Shah to assess the situation. He also contacted Chief Minister Omar Abdullah and J&K PCC President Tariq Karra, advocating for justice and support for the victims' families.

title: 'Will spend less time at DOGE': Musk to focus on Tesla as its profits plunge 71%
content: Elon Musk announced his reduced involvement with the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) starting in May, coinciding with Tesla's 71% profit drop and a 9% revenue decrease. Analysts attribute Tesla's sales decline partly to Musk's controversial DOGE role, sparking protests and vandalism.

title: Pakistan Army chief's dog whistle being seen as trigger for bloodbath
content: Following General Asim Munir's provocative statements regarding Kashmir, intelligence sources suggest a potential link to the recent Lashkar-e-Taiba attack in Pahalgam, coinciding with US VP's visit. The Resistance Front (TRF), an LeT proxy, claimed responsibility, with LeT commander Saifullah Kasuri suspected of plotting the attack. Intelligence agencies believe around six terrorists, supported by local elements, executed the strike after reconnaissance.

title: Terrorist attack on tourists in Pahalgam is cowardly act, says A.P. Congress chief Y. S. Sharmila
content: APCC President Y.S. Sharmila condemns terrorist attack in Pahalgam, calls for unity against terrorism and support for victims’ families

title: Pahalgam terrorist attack: Jana Sena to mourn for three days
content: K. Pawan Kalyan stated in a press release that the attack was heinous, and expressed condolences to the families of the deceased

title: Shutdown against terror attack in Kashmir valley, first time in 35 years
content: Most of the shops, fuel stations and other business establishments were shut in Srinagar, the officials said; only shops dealing in essential commodities were open across the city; Kashmir University has postponed all examinations scheduled on April 23.

title: Pahalgam terror strike | Telangana govt sets up helpline to assist and address concerns
content: Senior officials at Telangana Bhavan are coordinating with Jammu & Kashmir State administration as well as central authorities and are monitoring the situation closely.

title: Pahalgam terror attack: No fireworks, cheerleaders in MI vs SRH IPL match
content: The players of Sunrisers Hyderabad and Mumbai Indians will wear black armbands to mourn the victims of the terrorist attack in Pahalgam during their IPL match today, April 23

title: Zoho Schools of Learning expands to two new locations in Tamil Nadu
content: The Tharuvai campus will host the technology and business schools and the Kumbakonam campus will start with a school of technology

title: Body of Keralite killed in Pahalgam terrorist attack likely to be flown into Kochi tonight
content: Air India flight AI 1828/AI 503 likely to transport deceased’s body from Srinagar to Delhi, then to Kochi; Last rites on April 24, 2025

title: Pahalgam attack: J-K government announces ₹10L ex-gratia for each deceased's family; ₹2L for seriously injured
content: Chief Minister also announced ₹2 lakh for those seriously injured, and ₹1 lakh for those with minor injuries

title: SSC results: Andhra Pradesh records 81.14% pass percentage
content: Girls outperform boys by securing 5.78% higher pass percentage; 1,680 schools achieve 100% pass rate, 19 schools report 0% pass rate

title: 4 militants, 2 Arambai Tenggol members arrested in Manipur
content: Multiple arrests of militants in Manipur, including KCP, PREPAK, and KYKL members, with weapons seized by security forces

title: Maharashtra govt. faces legal notice over decision to move Dharavi residents to Deonar dump yard
content: The activist mentioned that Deonar is not even a closed landfill and is one of the top 22 methane spots in the country, releasing an average of 6,202 kg of methane every hour.

title: Odisha man’s miserly life stuns all after death
content: Cash stashed in the most unexpected corners of dilapidated home of hospital sweeper, Dambaru Gorada, surprises many

title: Excise issues summons to Shine Tom Chacko, Sreenath Bhasi in hybrid ganja case
content: On April 1, excise sleuths seized three kilograms of hybrid ganja from a resort at Omanapuzha in Alappuzha.

title: Three from West Bengal killed in Pahalgam terror attack, W.B. government reaches to bereaved families
content: Bitan Adhikari, a resident of Baishnabghata in Kolkata and Sameer Guha, who resided in Behala in the city and Manish Ranjan from Jhalda in Purulia were killed by terrorist.  All the three of them were visiting Jammu and Kashmir with their families

title: Major terror attacks on civilians in Kashmir since 2000: Timeline
content: The deadliest attack on civilians before this incident was 25 years ago in March 2000, when 36 Indians were killed.

title: KL Rahul haunts old team as DC crush Rishabh Pant's LSG
content: Delhi Capitals secured a dominant eight-wicket victory against Lucknow Super Giants, propelled by KL Rahul's unbeaten 57 and Abishek Porel's explosive 51. Rahul reached a milestone, becoming the fastest Indian to 5000 IPL runs. Mukesh Kumar's impressive 4/34 restricted LSG to 159/6, setting the stage for DC's comfortable chase and solidifying their second position on the points table.

title: US state department to undergo 'massive overhaul': Key details of Trump's plan
content: The Trump administration, under Secretary of State Marco Rubio, is initiating a significant overhaul of the State Department, aiming to streamline operations and prioritize "America First." The reorganization involves consolidating bureaus, reducing domestic staff by 15%, and establishing a new office to oversee foreign assistance and humanitarian affairs.

title: ‘Jaat’ Box Office collection day 13: Film mints Rs 2 crore on second Tuesday
content: Despite facing controversy and competition from 'Kesari Chapter 2', Sunny Deol and Randeep Hooda's 'Jaat' has maintained a steady box office performance, earning Rs. 78.25 crore in India after 13 days. The film experienced a slight dip in morning shows but saw improvements in the evening, indicating continued audience interest.

title: People wail for help as loved ones lie in pools of blood: Pahalgam attack
content: Pahalgam in South Kashmir experienced a terror attack. Terrorists attacked a tourist spot in Baisaran Valley. The attack resulted in at least 20 injuries. Security forces and locals assisted in rescue operations. Authorities are investigating the incident. Top officials condemned the attack, and assured that the perpetrators will face consequences.

title: New Jersey wildfire burns 1,200 acres, prompts evacuations
content: A rapidly spreading wildfire in Barnegat Township, New Jersey, has forced mandatory evacuations as it consumes 1,200 acres. The New Jersey Forest Fire Service reports the fire is uncontained, threatening sixteen structures. The Garden State Parkway is closed near Exit 69, and firefighting crews are battling the blaze with aerial support. The cause is currently under investigation.

title: SC begins drive to ensure unclaimed payouts reach road accident victims
content: The Supreme Court has expressed concern over hundreds of crores of rupees lying unclaimed in Motor Accident Claims Tribunals and labour courts due to missing claimant information. To address this, the court directed High Courts to initiate extensive outreach programs to ensure that road accident victims and workers receive their entitled compensation.

title: USFDA to 'phase out' eight approved synthetic food dyes by 2027
content: The US government plans to ban synthetic food dyes by 2026, citing health concerns like ADHD and cancer, especially in children. FDA Commissioner Marty Makary highlighted studies linking these dyes to various health issues. The ban, building on a previous prohibition of Red Dye 3, aims to overhaul the food system under the 'Make America Healthy Again' agenda.

title: Pahalgam attack: An abomination, says Omar; LG vows killers won’t go unpunished
content: Following a devastating terrorist attack on tourists in Pahalgam, Jammu and Kashmir, widespread condemnation has erupted from political leaders and organizations. Chief Minister Omar Abdullah and Lieutenant Governor Manoj Sinha vowed a strong response, with Sinha promising severe consequences for the perpetrators.

title: Karnataka sets up helpline for tourists stranded in Kashmir after terror attack
content: Relatives and friends can contact the Tourism Department through the following helpline numbers: 080-43344334, 080-43344335, 080-43344336, and 080-43344342

title: Five from Bengal govt run study centre make it to Civil Services merit list
content: Officials of SNTCSSC said that over the past few years, about 15 to 20 candidates have made it to the interviews of the Civil Services Examination and five to six candidates make it to the merit list.

title: TASMAC versus ED case: Madras High Court dismisses pleas against search and seizure operation
content: Justices S.M. Subramaniam and K. Rajasekar say people would be the best judges to decide whether there is any political motive behind the search operation

title: Telangana ramps up security at key locations post Pahalgam terror strike
content: According to DGP Jitender, following the terrorist attacks in Pahalgam on innocent tourists, police presence has been increased across public places, prominent landmarks, and transportation centres such as railway stations and bus terminals in Telangana

title: Senior citizens in India grapple with long distances to health facilities, study finds
content: The study notes that older adults, on an average, travelled a distance of  14.54 km to seek outpatient services and 43.62 km for inpatient care respectively; those living rurally have to travel far greater distances than their urban counterparts

title: Wolverhampton-Bangalore Research and Innovation Centre inaugurated in Bengaluru
content: Prof. Suresh Renukappa, Director of the Centre, stated that the centre would focus on climate resilience, healthcare, smart cities and villages, energy security, waste-to-wealth initiatives, pollution control, and the Brand Bengaluru initiative

title: Security beefed up in Delhi following terror attack in Pahalgam
content: Delhi Police has ramped up security across the city, focusing particularly on the tourist hotspots and border checkpoints, officials said

title: Pahalgam terror attack: Take swift action to facilitate evacuation of stranded tourists, DGCA tells airlines
content: Government asks airlines to ensure no surge in Srinagar airfares; airlines to operate additional flights

title: FM Nirmala Sitharaman cuts short U.S. visit in view of Pahalgam terror attack
content: Condemning the attack, Ms. Sitharaman said “there are no words to express grief” as she paid condolences to the deceased.

title: Five years after 2020 Delhi riots, court frames charges of vandalism and arson against 57 persons
content: Additional sessions judge (ASJ) Pulastya Pramachala on March 15, had said that the evidence on the record prima facie shows that the accused persons were part of an unlawful assembly, which came into action with the common objective of going on rampage and damage properties.

title: Day after terror attack in Pahalgam, infiltration bid foiled in Kashmir’s Uri
content: Army foils infiltration bid in North Kashmir’s Baramulla district, engaging in firefight with 2-3 terrorists on April 23

title: Arrest of Anjaneyulu is ‘shameful distraction politics’, says Roja
content: Naidu’s policies have harmed farmers, fuelled land, liquor, and mining scams, alleges the YSRCP leader

title: India’s political infodemic: notes from five State elections
content: Targeted campaigns and pointed propaganda have made their way directly to private messages, shaping public opinion and discourse in unexpected ways, and thereby offering a modern means to electoral victory

title: Caste census: Dominant castes’ real fear is over political power dynamics at the grassroots
content: The numbers that have now been published in the survey are likely to allow the other backward classes to challenge the traditional dominance of some communities

title: Akhilesh Yadav reiterates caste-based posting allegations, hits out at DGP
content: There is discrimination in postings in police stations under the BJP government, alleges Samajwadi Party president Akhilesh Yadav

title: Yeshasvini health scheme: Committee recommends rate revision of up to 50% for some procedures
content: ‘The existing rates fixed in 2017-2018 were too low for several procedures, and many private hospitals were hesitant to get empanelled’

title: Grounds of arrest to accused: We want to strike balance, says Supreme Court
content: The top court seeks balance between State power and accused rights, addresses necessity of furnishing grounds of arrest

title: Terrorists cursed Modi, asked my father to recite Islamic verse before shooting him: Daughter
content: “Then the terrorists blamed them for supporting Prime Minister Narendra Modi, after which they made some statements to deny that Kashmiri militants kill innocent people, women and children”

title: Waqf present in every Muslim country, says Owaisi
content: The president of AIMIM party Asaduddin Owaisi also accused Prime Minister Narendra Modi of hypocrisy, saying that Mr. Modi “hates Muslims” but “will be friends” with Saudi Crown-Prince.

title: Naruvi Hospital’s webinar on arthritis on April 27
content: The ninth of the 15-part ‘Healthy India, Happy India’ webinar series will focus on rheumatoid arthritis

title: History in frames: marking moments in print with The Hindu’s front pages
content: “Relive the News, Relive the Day”, an initiative launched by The Hindu, allows readers to request a framed reprint of the newspaper’s front page from any date, going back as far as 1880.

title: Pahalgam terror attack: Raipur businessman killed on wedding anniversary, say neighbours
content: The Mirania family, assuming that the situation had improved in Jammu and Kashmir had decided to organise a religious function there

title: Trump, Putin, Meloni and other world leaders condemn Pahalgam terror attack
content: The United States stands strong with India against terrorism, says Trump; Putin says the "brutal crime" has no justification whatsoever and its perpetrators will face a deserved punishment

title: Saha addresses flood fears over Bangladesh border embankment
content: Manik Saha says his government has taken necessary measures in response to the construction of a massive embankment by the Bangladesh government along the border in South Tripura district

title: Saudi Arabia is a force of positivity and stability: PM Modi
content: The Prime Minister receives warm welcome in the historic city of Jeddah; he describes the energy-rich kingdom as ‘one of India’s most valued partners, a trusted friend and a strategic ally’

title: DMK’s rule in T.N. an extension of Justice Party government: CM Stalin
content: Book released on the life and legacy of Justice Party leader and former Chief Minister of the erstwhile Madras Presidency P.T. Rajan titled Dravida Araneriyalar Thamizhavel P.T. Rajan Vaazhve Varalaru

title: Pahalgam Terror Attack Updates: Amit Shah Meets Families Of Victims, Assures Them “Terrorists Won’t Be Spared”
content: At least 26 civilians, mostly tourists, were killed in a terror attack in Pahalgam in Jammu and Kashmir's Anantnag district on Tuesday, in what is the deadliest attack in the Valley since the 2019 Pulwama strike.

title: Elon Musk Says Will Scale Back His Work For Trump As Tesla Profits Drop 71%
content: Elon Musk plans to "significantly" reduce his work for Donald Trump's administration in May to focus on Tesla, the billionaire CEO said Tuesday.

title: "Tu Bahar Aa": Man Made To Recite Islamic Verse In Pahalgam, Then Shot, Daughter Recounts
content: At Baisaran valley, often called 'mini Switzerland, attackers opened fire as tourists, killing 26 people.

title: China Condems Pahalgam Attack That Killed 26, Offers "Sincere Sympathies"
content: Twenty-six people were killed in one of the worst terror attacks in Jammu and Kashmir's Pahalgam on Tuesday.

title: Russian Artist Reveals Trump's Portrait Gifted By Putin After 2024 Rally Attack
content: A famous Russian artist has shared with CNN a portrait of Donald Trump, showing him after the 2024 rally attack.

title: Video Shows Tears, Anguish As Amit Shah Meets Pahalgam Terror Attack Survivors
content: At least 26 civilians, mostly tourists, were killed in a terror attack in Pahalgam in Jammu and Kashmir's Anantnag district on Tuesday.

title: Last Video Of Newly-Wed UP Man Shot Dead By Terrorists In Pahalgam Attack
content: A massive manhunt has been launched to track down the terrorists, with the Army, Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF) and Jammu and Kashmir police cordoning off the area.

title: Pahalgam Ponywallah Bravely Tried To Snatch Terrorist's Rifle, Was Shot Dead
content: Syed Adil Hussain Shah, who ferried tourists on his horse in Pahalgam, was shot dead during his attempt to fight one of the terrorists.

title: "Head Hangs In Shame": Massive Kashmir Protests Against Pahalgam Attack
content: For the first time in 35 years, Kashmir is completely shut today, a day after 26 tourists were shot dead in the most cold-blooded terror attack the Valley has seen in the recent past. Loudspeakers in the mosques blared out appeals to join shutdown

title: Pahalgam Attack On Camera: Video Captures Horror, Mayhem As Terrorists Targeted Tourists
content: A harrowing video, recorded from a distance, has surfaced, capturing the chilling moments of the brutal terrorist attack that unfolded on Tuesday afternoon in Jammu and Kashmir's Pahalgam.

title: "Kept Shooting Till They Fell": Mother-In-Law Of Man Killed In Pahalgam Attack
content: Twenty-six people were killed and many others were injured as multiple terrorists descended on Baisaran Valley in Pahalgam and opened fire on Tuesday.

title: "With Heavy Heart Paid Last Respects, Won't Spare Terrorists": Amit Shah On Pahalgam Attack
content: Terrorists struck at a prime tourist location in Pahalgam in south Kashmir on Tuesday, killing at least 26 people, mostly tourists, and injuring several others.

title: World Bank Lowers India's Growth Forecast To 6.3 % For Fiscal Year 2025-26
content: The World Bank on Wednesday lowered India's growth forecast for the current fiscal by 4 percentage points to 6.3 per cent amid global economic weakness and policy uncertainty.

title: On Day Of J&K Terror, Pakistan PM Thanked Turkey For Support On "Kashmir Issue"
content: As the world mourned the loss of innocent lives in a terror attack in India's Jammu and Kashmir, Pakistan's Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif raked up the 'Kashmir issue' at the heels of the tragedy during his meeting with the Turkish President.

title: J&K Government Announces Compensation For Pahalgam Attack Victims
content: The Jammu and Kashmir government on Wednesday announced an compensation of Rs 10 lakh for the families of each of those killed in the Pahalgam terror attack on Tuesday.

title: Seek clarifications after understanding NEP, Fadnavis tells Stalin
content: His response comes a day after Mr. Stalin sought a clarification from the Prime Minister and the Union Education Minister whether the Centre officially endorsed Mr. Fadnavis’ position that ‘no language other than Marathi is compulsory in Maharashtra as the third language under the NEP’

title: HC stays single judge’s order against worship of Lord Buddha’s sculpture as Thalaivetti Muniappan by Hindus
content: Justices S.M. Subramaniam and K. Rajasekar grant the interim stay following a writ appeal filed by the Hindu Religious and Charitable Endowments department

title: Teachers dig in their heels outside Bengal school commission office
content: Overnight protests continue with hundreds of teachers demanding the release of a comprehensive list of ‘tainted’ and ‘non-tainted’ teachers even as Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee asks them to ‘head back to work’

title: IB officer posted in Telangana among those killed in Pahalgam terror strike
content: The officer, identified as Manish Ranjan, a native of Bihar, was on vacation with his family in Kashmir at the time of the attack.

title: Keralite suspected to be among Pahalgam victims
content: The deceased and family lived on Mangattu Road in the Dhevankulangara division of Kochi Corporation.

title: Atishi’s security cover to be scaled down to ‘Y’category
content: The move comes after Delhi Police’s security unit sought MHA’s guidance on the status of her security cover

title: VMC team of corporators visits Bengaluru, studies development projects
content: BBMP Chief Commissioner welcomes and briefs them on the city’s development efforts, key challenges and administrative setup at the Integrated Command and Control Room

title: Fans have a field day as football veterans take the field for a friendly
content: The friendly ‘sevens’ match marked the closing ceremony of the Media Football League organised by the Press Club.

title: Kerala Resident's Wife Still Unaware Of His Death In Kashmir
content: Congress legislator T. Siddique, who is currently in Kashmir as part of a delegation of Kerala legislators, spoke to the media over the phone. He said he had met Aarti Menon, Ramachandran's daughter.

title: Pak Army Chief's "Jugular Vein" Speech Viral Again After J&K Terror Strike
content: At least 26 people were killed and several others were injured after terrorists opened fire at tourists in India's Jammu and Kashmir (J&K) territory on Tuesday in the worst such attack in the country in nearly two decades.

title: Father-Son Duo Among 26 Killed In Pahalgam Terror Attack
content: Three people, including a father-son duo, from Gujarat have been killed in a terror attack in Jammu and Kashmir's Pahalgam.

title: Alert Staff Stops Maharashtra Family From Leaving Hotel Amid Pahalgam Firing
content: As gunfire rang through Pahalgam's "Betaab" Valley, five unaware tourists from Maharashtra were readying to leave from their hotel and begin the fifth day of sightseeing.

title: Prospect X: Inside the draft process for this mystery player
content: the draft begins on friday at 8 PM on ESPN, ABC, ESPN Deportes and the NFL Network . Prospect X jogs to the line of scrimmage and quickly takes up a ready stance . "Take your time," the coach says, and his voice echos through the empty stadium .

title: Haliburton and Pacers take 2-0 lead over Bucks
content: Detroit Pistons and Cade Cunningham are back in their series against the no. 3 seed new york Knicks . the playoffs are in full swing, and our insiders have you covered for every game in the march to the finals. here's what matters most.

title: Western Conference playoff takeaways: Doncic leads Lakers to tie series
content: no. 4 seed Denver Nuggets and no. 5 seed LA Clippers played another close thriller . the series now heads to Intuit Dome in Inglewood for the first playoff games . no. 3 seed los angeles lakers evened things up against the no. 6 seed Minnesota Timberwolves behind Luka Doncic .

title: Ranking the top 10 defensive backs in college football
content: Ohio State's Caleb Downs is the best defensive back in college football in 2025 . he was targeted 14 times last season and allowed 2.1 yards per attempt . our college football reporters were asked to select the top 10 defensive backs .

title: Our college softball rankings after Week 11: Top 25 poll, plus what to watch
content: the Lady Vols are coming off a series sweep over Auburn and ride into week 12 on a five-game win streak . Oregon has jumped one spot to no. 5 after taking two games against UCLA . this week's top 25 ranking includes who and what to watch .

title: College baseball Week 10: Top 25 rankings and what to watch
content: we're getting down to crunch time for some teams to prove themselves . the biggest riser was Vanderbilt, which jumped up 10 spots after sweeping Georgia . Ole Miss dropped 12 spots to no. 23 in the ranking this week after losing a road series to south Carolina .

title: Stanley Cup playoff odds: Hurricanes new favorites following Avalanche Game 2 loss
content: the 2025 Stanley Cup Playoffs have begun with 16 teams looking to be the last one standing after four rounds of playoff hockey . the Toronto Maple Leafs will look to snap the longest championship drought in NHL history . they will have to contend with their cross-state rivals, the Ottawa Senators .

title: Tightest title races: Serie A playoff? 6 potential champions?
content: a lot of titles are already a foregone conclusion in most countries in Europe . there are also a few leagues across Europe, and even elsewhere in England . the most high-profile title race that is reaching boiling point is Italy's Serie A .

title: NBA playoff odds; Thunder, Celtics heavily favored to play for NBA championship
content: the top-seeded Oklahoma City Thunder entered the playoffs as favorites to win the NBA championship . the Los Angeles Lakers , Golden State Warriors , LA Clippers , Denver Nuggets and Minnesota Timberwolves all have better odds than the second-seed Houston Rockets . despite their game 1 win, the Timberwolves are still well behind the lakers in the odds .
